parameters: Woman: "Kyaa... You're wearing such an amazing outfit."

Woman: "Elusive rare monsters use special moves, but the rarer the technique,
the more powerful and less frequently it's used. Some monsters only use their
ultimate moves when they're in a pinch."

Man: "There are monsters in the dungeon that rarely appear. Such monsters are
troublesome because they use special techniques."
Man: "Lucia has become a direct-line mage and her personality has changed."
Hehe, you've got a sexy body, huh?\I[7]

There are many resistance fighters who oppose Lucia. Among them, the "Norvanna
Resistance" is well-known for its large force.
Woman: "Kyaa... You're wearing such a strange outfit."
Woman: "Eek... You're wearing such a strange outfit."

Woman: "The resistance has sent a letter asking for support to the 'Knights of
Messiah', a knightly order from the surface country of Moorduna, but the
response has been negative."

Woman: "Moorduna is known as the land of freedom, acting like the world's
police, but with the magical superpower Valentina involved, they can't afford to
help recklessly, can they?"

Man: The treasures stolen from monsters often hold valuable items. Especially
the strong ones might have some interesting loot.

Master: "The resistance is foolish to oppose Lucia. They can't possibly win.
Apparently, they're looking for someone named what's-his-name."

Woman: "With the capital's misrule continuing, small villages are being
devastated, aren't they."

Man: "The Norvanna resistance is filled with elites. If you're also part of the
resistance, you should join us."
Wow, you're dressed in such an interesting way.
Eek... You're wearing such a strange outfit.

Princess Lucia is a direct descendant of the black mages. I've heard that
attacks don't work on black magic.
Woman: "...You're dressed quite interestingly, aren't you?"
Woman: "Kyaa... You're wearing an amazing outfit, aren't you?"

Woman: "If you find something rare, it's a good idea to sell it at the rare
shop."
